Spawn a FireBall on a random point of x axis.

Spawn a FireBall using MainGame.spawnFireBall() or MainGame.spawnFireBall(FireBall).
spawnLifePickup() - Method in class game.MainGame
Spawns a LifePickup every 1000 points in a random location on top half of the screen.
spawnStarPickup() - Method in class game.MainGame
